info.title: Stack Exchange
info.description: Create apps or scripts that can access Stack Exchange questions, answers, comments, badges and more.

get.description: Get all answers on the site.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: When "true", a post's body will be included in the response. boolean

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: When "true", any comments on a post will be included in the response. boolean

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Unix timestamp of the minimum creation date on a returned item. unix epoch date, range [0, 253,402,300,799]

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. integer or unix epoch date

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Minimum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. integer or unix epoch date

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: How the current sort should be ordered. one of desc (default), or asc

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination offset for the current collection. Affected by the specified pagesize. 32-bit signed integer

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: The number of collection results to display during pagination. Should be between 0 and 100 inclusive. 32-bit signed integer

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: How a collection should be sorted. one of activity (default), creation, or votes

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Unix timestamp of the maximum creation date on a returned item. Unix epoch date, range [0, 253,402,300,799]

200.description: Create apps or scripts that can access Stack Exchange questions, answers, comments, badges and more.

get.description: Get answers identified by a set of ids.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A single primary key identifier or a vectorized, semicolon-delimited list of identifiers. This is a vectorized parameter, multiple ids can be sent a single request if delimited with a semi-colon. string

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: When "true", a post's body will be included in the response. boolean

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: When "true", any comments on a post will be included in the response. boolean

parameters.name: fromdate
parameters.description: Unix timestamp of the minimum creation date on a returned item. unix epoch date, range [0, 253,402,300,799]

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. integer or unix epoch date

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Minimum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. integer or unix epoch date

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: How the current sort should be ordered. one of desc (default), or asc

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination offset for the current collection. Affected by the specified pagesize. 32-bit signed integer

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: The number of collection results to display during pagination. Should be between 0 and 100 inclusive. 32-bit signed integer

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: How a collection should be sorted. one of activity (default), creation, or votes

parameters.name: todate
parameters.description: Unix timestamp of the maximum creation date on a returned item. Unix epoch date, range [0, 253,402,300,799]

get.description: Search the site for questions meeting certain criteria.

parameters.description: Maximum of the range to include in the response according to the current sort. integer or unix epoch date

parameters.description: The number of collection results to display during pagination. Should be between 0 and 100 inclusive. 32-bit signed integer

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: How a collection should be sorted. one of activity (default), creation, or votes

get.description: Search the site based on similarity to a title.

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: When "true", any comments on a post will be included in the response. boolean

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A title. string
